name: Feed for Pending Comments
author: Sk Nepal

sections.description:
Feed for pending comments is a simple WordPress plugin that generates a RSS feed for pending comments on your website or blog. You can access the pending comments feed by visiting yoursite.com/pencom-feed.

This plugin is actually meant to go together with a recipe from IFTTT.com. By using this plugin and the site IFTTT.com, you’ll be able to receive SMS everytime someone comments on your site. You can read the tutorial/guide on how to do it here : http://www.thelacunablog.com/?p=924

We post computer tips, guides and how to’s. Visit us here: www.thelacunablog.com
sections.installation:
Here is what you need to do:

  1. Install plugin OR unzip the downloaded file to /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Go to your plugin settings and enable the plugin.
  3. Go to yoursite.com/pencom-feed to access the RSS feed.
sections.faq:
Where is the feed located?

You can access the feed by going to yoursite.com/pencom-feed.

Can I use custom page?

No, the ability to use custom page for showing RSS feed is not available right now.

short_description: Displays the pending comments (comments requiring approval) on a separate page as an RSS feed.
